hero.title: Financial Advisory,

features.heading: Enterprise CFO Intelligence
features.subheading: Everything your advisory firm needs to scale
features.dashboardDesc: Unified view of all client financials with health scores, cash flow forecasts, and real-time alerts across your portfolio.
features.ledgerDesc: Multi-entity journal management with CSV import, automated reconciliation, and audit-ready trail for every transaction.
features.reportsDesc: AI-generated financial reports with configurable templates, trend analysis, and board-ready presentation formatting.
features.complianceDesc: Automated tax filing status, regulatory deadline tracking, and multi-jurisdictional compliance monitoring.
features.workflowsDesc: Drag-and-drop workflow builder for recurring engagements, onboarding sequences, and approval chains.
features.collaborationDesc: Role-based access, dual-control workflows, secure document sharing, and client portal with self-service capabilities.

mission.heading: Scaling Advisory with Intelligence
